scripts.common:build: yarn common build; yarn install; yarn commonui build; yarn install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "ADMIN,PUBLIC,BACKEND" -c "bgRed.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold" --kill-others "yarn workspace @myboothmanager/admin dev" "yarn workspace @myboothmanager/public dev" "yarn workspace @myboothmanager/backend start:dev"
scripts.preview: concurrently -n "ADMIN,PUBLIC,BACKEND" -c "bgRed.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold" --kill-others "yarn workspace @myboothmanager/admin preview" "yarn workspace @myboothmanager/public preview" "yarn workspace @myboothmanager/backend start:prod"
